purpose: Restore, secure, and future-proof Nevada's public service systems after state-level cyberattack; embed Mythic Stewardship Clause for replication to other communities.

deliverables.name: Incident Containment Protocols
deliverables.description: Isolate infected networks, eradicate malicious code, and neutralize all detected backdoors. Implement immediate firewall lockdown and intrusion prevention triggers.

deliverables.name: Forensic Breach Path Mapping
deliverables.description: Full chain-of-custody analysis, tracing point of entry, lateral movement, and compromised asset inventory with immutable logging.

deliverables.name: Critical Services Restoration
deliverables.description: Bring 911, emergency health, and law enforcement systems back online under enhanced security segmentation.

deliverables.name: Essential Government Operations Reactivation
deliverables.description: Phased reactivation of licensing, benefits processing, and municipal services with zero-trust access controls.

deliverables.name: Full Departmental Restoration
deliverables.description: Return all remaining state agency systems to operational status after security hardening and audit clearance.

deliverables.name: Security Architecture Upgrade
deliverables.description: Deploy MFA, network segmentation, AI-driven anomaly detection, and real-time threat intelligence integration.

deliverables.name: Continuity Plan Revision
deliverables.description: Update Nevada Cybersecurity Plan to reflect new threat intelligence, defensive tools, and response protocols.

deliverables.name: 90-Day Resilience Metrics Report
deliverables.description: Assess post-recovery strength, breach recurrence prevention, and readiness for future incidents.

deliverables.name: Staff Cybersecurity Training & Drills
deliverables.description: Deliver live and simulated exercises to improve phishing resistance, incident response, and security hygiene.

deliverables.name: Mythic Stewardship Replication Kit
deliverables.description: Package recovery frameworks, blueprints, and training into an open-access scroll for other jurisdictions.
